    • Constructor Detail

      • ScotlandYardGameTree

        public ScotlandYardGameTree(ScotlandYardState currentGameState)
        Creates a game tree with just the parent node. Node's score is set to a default of zero.
        Parameters:
        currentGameState - ScotlandYardView implementing object to be root node of ScotlandYardGameTree.

        public java.util.PriorityQueue<AINode> getChildrenQueue(AINode node,
                                                        java.util.Comparator<AINode> comp)
        Returns the children of node in a tree as a PriorityQueue. Must pass in comparator to give AINode's an ordering.
        Parameters:

        comp - the comparator of AINode's to determine their order.
